column5: Function to be implemented

Exports the PDF pages as image files ask user which format ( JPEG/JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, AVIF, TIFF, BMP, HEIF/HEIC, RAW variants, etc.) he/she wants the images as well as how many pages to be converted to images after user choose the format convert page/pages to the same and download them
Opens a PDF file/files in multiple tab
Saves the current document
Adds new content or pages and can be saved
Removes selected content or pages and can be saved
Refreshes or reloads the current document
Exports the PDF in various formats(Text, Word,Excel,PPT,Image,PDF/A) give the user to option to choose between (Text, Word,Excel,PPT,Image,PDF/A)  implement  it so that Icon works as desired
Prints the current document
Hand tool for navigation (pan mode) and moving pdf pages
Selection tool to select and interact with objects make text . Images active for further changes
Highlights text with a option given for color choise to user yellow or custom color after that user can save the highlited document

Opens "Edit all" menu with two sub munu "Text Edit" & "Image Edit"  when selected with Text Edit user will be able to select any text giving option to chenge font, font size, color of text. When selected with Edit Image he will be able to edit the image in MS-Paint and in both the case can save the changes in PDF
Adds text to the PDF document user will be able to add any text in  any part of the PDF giving option to chenge font, font size, color of text and then user can save the changes in pdf
Optical Character Recognition to extract text from images and can save the same in a file downloadable

Converts PDF pages to image format ask user which format ( JPEG/JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, AVIF, TIFF, BMP, HEIF/HEIC, RAW variants, etc.) give user option to choose how many pages user wants to convert to images after user choise pages are converted to desired images format download the same
Merges multiple PDF files into one, opening multiple pdf in multiple tabs of canvas then user can save the same
Compresses PDF to reduce file size should be giving user to % compress and it should be compressed to desired lavel and downloaded
Takes a screenshot of the current page
Highlights selected text in the document for further changes user wants
Underlines selected text and can be saved in pdf
Strikes through selected text
Adds a sticky note annotation in box form to the document and can be saved
Allows freehand drawing on the PDF
Inserts shapes (circles, square, triangle etc) give user select from option given like Sticky Note and can be saved
Opens a panel to Add and manage all comments and can be saved
Edits existing text in the PDF user will be able to edit any text in  any part of the PDF giving option to change font, font size, color of text and then user can save the changes in pdf
Edits images embedded in the PDF in MS Paint
Adds new text to the PDF user will be able to add any text in  any part of the PDF giving option to chenge font, font size, color of text and then user can save the changes in pdf
Adds new images to the PDF giving option to choose imasge from local drive and can savw it in pdf
Selects and manipulates objects on the page giving option to save the changes in pdf
Aligns selected objects (left, center, right, top, bottom) and can be saved
Rotates selected objects or pages and can be saved
Resizes selected objects or pages and can be saved
Crops the selected area of a page and can be saved
Converts PDF pages to image files gives user option to choose number of pages as well as between ( JPEG/JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, AVIF, TIFF, BMP, HEIF/HEIC, RAW variants, etc.) and is downloaded
Converts PDF to PDF/A archival format and download the same
Converts PDF content to plain text file and download the same
Inserts a new blank page or copied page from other PDF into the PDF and can be saved
Deletes the selected page from the PDF and can be saved
Extracts selected pages into a new PDF
Rotates the selected page and can be saved
Rotates the page in the opposite direction and can be saved
Changes the order of pages in the PDF and can be saved
Creates a copy of the selected page download the same
Adds PDF files to merge open in new tab of canvas
Performs the merge operation open in new tab of canvas
Opens the resulting merged PDF
Encrypts the PDF with a password and can be saved
Sets access permissions for the PDF apply the same to pdf
Adds a digital signature to the PDF and can be saved
Redacts sensitive information from the PDF and can be saved
Removes metadata and personal information from the PDF and can be saved
Merges multiple PDF files opens the merged file in new tab
Splits a PDF into multiple files ask user number of pages to be splite download them
Compresses the PDF to reduce file size gives user to choose % of compression
Inspects PDF structure and properties and display user the same giving user to close information saving the same
Advanced optical character recognition options save the out put in file
Flattens all layers and annotations into the PDF download the same
